summary: Arkay's Hand Reborn for Skyrim Eng/Rus
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=3][b][center][font=Verdana]
Before we start, I want to say a big [color=#ff0000]THANK YOU![/color] to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/663989/]bronze316[/url] for amazing [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15983/]TrueVision ENB[/url]
that gave me a possibility to make a screenshots for this mod.[/font][/center][/b][/size][/color]
[size=4][center]

[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][color=#ffffff][color=#ffff00]Arkay's Hand Reborn[/color] for Skyrim v1.0 Eng/Rus[/color][/color][/font][/center][/size][center]
[font=Tahoma][size=3][color=#1e84cc][size=4][size=3][color=#00ffff]SE version is available[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/13456/]HERE[/url][/size][/size][/color][/size][/font][/center][font=Tahoma][size=3][color=#1e84cc]

[/color][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, location

[color=#ffff00]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds new battleaxe - Arkay's Hand - that deals extra damage to draugrs (25 pts of additional damage). It can be obtained in Sizanvund - Nordic dungeon, that is not very far from Stendarr's Beacon. In other words, on the Southeast of the game map.

[color=#ffff00]Weapon stats:[/color]
Type: Battleaxe
Weight: 25
Damage: base 22, crit 10
Reach: 1.3
Speed: 0.7
Enchantment: Deals extra damage to draugrs
Improvement: Ebony ingot, optimal perk - Ebony smithing


[/size][/font][size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Join me on my [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/RonnieMagnumModsAndOther/]Facebook group[/url] to be updated about my upcoming mods.

On my [url=http://ronnietheblacksmith.deviantart.com/]Deviantart page[/url]...

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size]
author: Ronnie Magnum
